channel.title: Cards on CloudNativePG - PostgreSQL Operator for Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Cards on CloudNativePG - PostgreSQL Operator for Kubernetes

item.title: Autopilot
item.description: It automates the steps that a human operator would do to deploy and to manage a Postgres database inside Kubernetes, including automated failover.

item.title: Data persistence
item.description: It doesn’t rely on statefulsets and uses its own way to manage persistent volume claims where the PGDATA is stored.

item.title: Designed for Kubernetes
item.description: It’s entirely declarative, and directly integrates with the Kubernetes API server to update the state of the cluster — for this reason, it does not require an external failover management tool.
